verbose_text: Autophagosome formation requires two Atg5 dependent conjugation systems that generate Atg5-Atg12, which complexes with Atg16 on the isolation membrane and ligates LC3 (also known as Atg8) to phosphatidylethanolamine (PE) thereby localizing LC3 to the nascent autophagosome.
evidence: Atg5-Atg12, which complexes with Atg16 on the isolation membrane and ligates LC3
